article: Mrs Brown is from London in  the UK  , but she likes  _  in China. She says her students all study  _  and they are all very friendly. She loves her students. Mrs Brown has a son and a daughter.  _  son's name is Jack. He is ten years old. His sister, Linda, is 11 years old. They go to school here in China. They have classes  _  weekdays. They like their school very  much  .  _  school they often go shopping. They  go  swimming twice a week. Sometimes they help their mother  _  some housework. They have a happy  _  .
